channel.title: Comments on: Performance Impacts of Unicode, Equals vs LIKE, and Partially Filled Fixed Width
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Andy P
item.dc:creator: Andy P
item.content:encoded:
Great post! This came up with me at work recently. I’ve never really used nvarchar datatypes before, so it was a bit of detective work required on my part to work out why my query was performing so slowly. After a bit of trial and error I realised it was the data types that had been chosen. Nice to see it qualified with stats. Also, thanks for posting the sample scripts – some useful techniques in there too!
Cheers
Andy
